column2:
Can perform Snake Eyes moves at any time
during Heat state.
column7:
Counterhit confirmable jab string. Great tool to check 
 opponents overextending on their pressure.

column17:
granted after hitting
certain moves or taunting

column7: Long range safe mid heat engager with good tracking.
Situational confirmable heat engager from sidestep.

Single jab to check situations. It has strong extensions 
 such as 1,2,1 to catch opponents challenging your jabs and 
 1,2,4 for a counterhit confirmable heat engager.

Mid poke with some extensions that are useful to stop 
 opponents from challenging it.
A quick low poke that sets you back to midrange on hit.
Relatively fast mid counterhit launcher you can use at close.

column7:
Mid counterhit launcher to control the midrange. During 
 Snake Eyes or Heat state, it gains an extension in 3+4,2 
 that is useful for pressuring opponents at the wall.

Strong low move to harass the opponent and start pressure.  
 Use this against opponents that stand block too much.

High counterhit launcher that can also be used to control 
 the midrange. Mix this option with qcf+1+2.

Bryan's taunt is an unique guard breaking move. Its use 
 is quite advanced and makes his wall pressure even scarier. 
 Not a requirement for new players, so see it as
 an end game goal.

column12:
After tornado, you can get a strong tailspin with (b+2),f+4
into Heat Burst

After tornado, use b+3,F  2,1 for long wallsplat and db+2
for when it's already close to the wall
qcf+1+2 to break the wall and qcf+2,2 to floor break
